long_description: The 12 ft. Eddyline Sandpiper Kayak has a large cockpit for any paddler and its stable design makes it great for day trips on mellow waters. Take along your kid, your dog or your fishing rod. Large cockpit makes it easy to get into kayak and soft foam seat and backrest enhance comfort during long paddles. Co-extruded ABS laminate creates a hull that offers the looks and performance of a composite kayak with the durability of plastic. 2-layer plastic laminate offers incredible stiffness and a hard, glossy appearance that resists abrasion and impact; plus, because it's plastic, it can also be easily repaired. Features 2 hatches to store day-tripping gear, bow and stern bulkheads, bungee deck rigging and carry handles. Very manageable 38 lb. weight makes it easy to load the Eddyline Sandpiper Kayak on top of a car and carry it to the water.
short_description: The 12 ft. Eddyline Sandpiper Kayak has a large cockpit for any paddler and its stable design makes it great for day trips on mellow waters. Take along your kid, your dog or your fishing rod.
